name: 2DPlatformer (Aridizan)
description:
Created by Zane Aridi

Proposed Modifications:

1. I will create a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level. By adding more challenges and rooms.  There may be a boss at the end.

2. I will reskin the existing graphics in some significant way, I plan on changing the player to a completely different character.

3. I will add new obstacles and challenges like spikes and moving projectiles.
